sections.heading: coyotes from aircraft; permitholder; report
sections.text: The holder of a permit issued under section 37-458 shall report to the commission, not later than fifteen days after the end of each calendar quarter, the number of coyotes taken during such quarter.SourceLaws 1972, LB 1204, ยง 4;R.S.1943, (1993), ยง 37-234;
